Author: Woonkly
Title: What is Woonkly?
Body: Woonkly is the first direct and decentralized connection token between brands and their audience, using 100% Open Source tools.  https://icoholder.com/files/img/f9e51cdb4641db29c35df36c55d6e22c.png   The registration in woonkly is free for both content creators and users. Content creators can link their videos, images or posts from different platforms in a woonkly way for free to get more exposure or if they prefer they can pay their target audience using our “woonk” cryptocurrency to get thousands or even millions of views or interactions in a matter of hours, minutes or even seconds.  Woonkly is born from the idea that sharing is the basis of success. Our philosophy is that everyone wins.  Think about it. Internationally, the annual advertising investment exceeds 600 billion dollars. Imagine part of that money going directly to people who see that advertising. Would not it be more fair? More logical?  That is Woonkly. The connection between the capital that companies or artists invest in advertising and the people who watch the videos of those companies or artists. We connect the capital of advertisers with their target audience.  The main benefits for each group are:  USERS:  Earn money by watching videos (Youtube, Vimeo, Viuli …) Earn money by sharing digital content Earn money by interacting with videos, images and posts Participate in free daily cryptocurrency lotteries  CREATORS OF CONTENT AND ADVERTISERS:  Link your content for free and get exposure Viralize your content in seconds with the boost tool 10 times more accessible than any other tool Reward your audience directly for your attention  LINKS  Web: https://woonkly.com Whitepaper: https://woonkly.com/whitepaper/whitepaper-woonkly-julio-ENG.pdf  video: https://www.youtube.com/wafeature=youtu.betch?v=uihUNcGTe9A& Mr santos: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCo3hRG_jF6lAVzOUh_UM5Sg Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/woonkly/ Twitter ESP: https://twitter.com/woonkly Twitter ENG:  https://twitter.com/WoonklyTV Telegram ESP: https://t.me/woonklyes Telegram ENG: https://t.me/woonklyen Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/woonkly/?hl=en Discord: https://discordapp.com/channels/431373309515399180/432675060751400981 Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/woonkly/ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/Woonkly Medium: https://medium.com/@woonkly Bitcointalk: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile Blog: https://magazine.woonkly.com Github: https://github.com/Woonkly
